name: The Cat Burglar (No, really)
description:
Like a shadow in the night, you must sneak around a  supermarket after dark. Collect items from your shopping list and drop them off at the front of the store. Some may require a little 'creativity' to reach and some surfaces are climbable.

Beware! Security guards patrol the halls. If they see you, you'll be sure to be made into cat soup. Use your meow to distract them (c).

Your mission is important. You have 3 humans at home that require the essentials. Remember your training, and don't get caught!
